Literature.Title: An antimicrobial bicyclic peptide from chemical space against multidrug resistant Gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Di Bonaventura I, Baeriswyl S, Capecchi A, Gan BH, Jin X, Siriwardena TN, He R, Köhler T, Pompilio A, Di Bonaventura G, van Delden C, Javor S, Reymond JL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis BR151(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PEJ 2.6(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PEJ 9.1(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM9.A(MIC=64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=64-128µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=>64µg/ml)
